attributes.review: I opened this app and my eyes were assaulted by I large Cheeto looking monster. I don’t know how to feel about this recent assault. I am now a victim of the Cheeto mans eye assaults
attributes.title: I was assaulted

attributes.review: This app is garbage it always crashes very laggy I would be better at getting info in a textbook this app belongs in the dumpster
attributes.title: Very bad

attributes.review: Took several days to download! The whole app run super slow, all fake information! 100 % don’t vote for trump
attributes.title: Terrible app!

attributes.review: Like our president, this app is just the worst. Spreading lies and allowing hatred to gather right from our phones. Can’t support that racist or this app. Just can’t. BLM!
attributes.title: Just the worst

attributes.review: i downloaded this app so i could keep up with what our great president was doing, however the texts were infrequent, & didn’t tell me anything useful. the app took up an insane amount of storage on my phone, just to be utterly useless. i would not recommend this app to anyone.
attributes.title: waste of storage

attributes.review: I downloaded the app because I wanted to see how slow in the head Donald the orange is and boy was I surprised he is very slow so he gets 1 star
attributes.title: Bad app

attributes.review: This app is full of FAKE NEWS and spam. completely horrible. Do NOT recommend.
attributes.title: Not Reliable for news

attributes.review: I don’t even give this app a star is is not useful in anyway do not download this app it gives your phone a virus
attributes.title: Trump is the worst president

attributes.review: This app completely broke my phone, my phone crashed and I had to get a complete new one. Do not recommend.
attributes.title: Angry

attributes.review: i opened this app and i saw this horrifying cheeto man staring into my soul. I couldn’t get this weird face out of my head, it was just so bad. it looked like a dried up orange.
attributes.title: this is ✨garbage✨
